description: This file defines the GuestsController class, which manages guest invitations and RSVP statuses within an event planning application. It includes endpoints for inviting guests, listing guests, updating RSVP statuses, and removing guests. The class interacts with the IGuestService for business logic and uses ASP.NET Core MVC attributes for routing and authorization.

classes.name: GuestsController
classes.description: Controller handling guest invitation management for events, including inviting guests, listing guests, updating RSVP statuses, and removing guests.

methods.name: Invite
methods.description: Endpoint to invite a guest to an event, requiring ownership and returning the created guest response.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Endpoint to list all guests for a specific event, requiring ownership.

methods.name: UpdateStatus
methods.description: Endpoint to update a guest's RSVP status, requiring ownership.

methods.name: Remove
methods.description: Endpoint to remove a guest from an event, requiring ownership.

methods.name: ToResponse
methods.description: Converts a Guest domain model to a GuestResponse DTO.
